stories.text:
Over the course of the last month, every time I've tried to search for recent developments on specific topics by using the date filter on Google's UI (not the search syntax) the results shown sometimes point to articles over a year old.

Has this been happening to anyone else?
stories.title: Tell HN: Google date filters not working properly
It’s Still Stupidly, Difficult to Buy a ‘Dumb’ TV
Cultural Anorexia: The Pursuit of Thicker Desires in a Thinning World

stories.text:
I gave my first attempt at building a dApp, getting onto web3 dev ftw!

Check it out at: https://apexchain.vercel.app
stories.title: Made a dApp that lets you send digital assets (Ethers) to your friends' wallets

stories.text:
Hey there!

We are launching "Burnout Assessment for Remote Teams" on Product Hunt in 1 month! Super pumped and need some help from the YC community.

Recently we had a heated argument, how remote teams under 50 people manage burnout? Would be glad to hear different opinions.
stories.title: How does your remote team beat burnout?
